captions.text: [MUSIC PLAYING]
-Hey, guys.

It's Bailey from Cute
Girls Hairstyles.

Today I'm going
to be showing you

how to do the
triple knot accents.

And as you guys know, I
did chop my hair short,

which I was
super-nervous at first.
But I love it now.

But you guys have been asking
a lot for the short hairstyles.

Some of the longer
braids and hairstyles

that you do for long hair
don't work on short hair.

And I've definitely
been learning that.

But I have also learned
that a lot of accents
work on short hair.

So I'm here to show you guys
this really cute one today.

The first thing that
you're going to do

is part your hair on
either side of your head.

And then you're
just going to want

to take a small
piece from the top.

And you're going to
pull back a little bit.

And then literally,
you're literally
tying a knot with your fingers.
You wrap it around.
Pull the end through.

Just like you would
tie any other knot.
Tighten it up.

And then once you have
knot in your hair,

take a bobby pin, straddle
the knot with the bobby pin,
and then push it straight in.
So it stays.

Then you can pull some hair
over to cover up the bobby pin.

So now that we
have one, I'm going

to continue, and do
the exact same thing

with two other
pieces of my hair.

Now I'm going to
take a second piece,

wrap it around, and then
tie it in a knot again.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
Take a bobby pin.

Straddle it again,
just like I did before.
Push it in.
And then the third piece.

So once you have all three
of your knots pinned,

you're going to want to
pull a piece of hair over,

trying to cover up the bobby
pins as much as possible.

And once you've
finished doing that,

and you like the way
everything looks--

I'm going to fix
this hair over here.

Now that I'm finished, I'll
show you the final product.
This is the top of it.
Ta-da.
And then we'll spin around.

The curls that I did
today are flat-iron curls.

If you want to find
out how to do those,

we have a video link in
the description box below.

Also, just a reminder we
do stay online for an hour
after every upload.

We call it Power Hour,
where we try and answer all
of y'all's comments.

We do it on this channel and our
channel, Brooklyn and Bailey.

If you liked this
short hair style

go ahead and give this
video a thumbs-up.

And also, don't forget
to leave a comment below

if you want to see
more short hair styles.

And if so, what do
you want them to be?
Also, subscribe.
Click this button and subscribe.

And I think that's all we
have for you guys today.
So we'll see you guys next week.
Bye!
[MUSIC PLAYING]

When you get down
here to the bottom,

you can fill those sections
that you've already used before.

They're a little
bit separated off.

So now I'm just grabbing
each of those sections from--
[MUSIC PLAYING]
What is this?
-Is that a beard?
Beautiful.
-Oh, look.
There's another one.
This is like a ball of hair.

-You want to know
where that came from?
The shower drain.
